actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commodity Exchanges, Energy, and Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development

official_title: To provide for the protection of proprietary information provided to the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, and for other purposes.
short_title: CFTC Cybersecurity and Data Protection Enhancement Act

summary.text:
CFTC Cybersecurity and Data Protection Enhancement Act

This bill addresses information requested and maintained by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission. Specifically, the commission must submit a request for proprietary information that includes the method of access to the data, data formats, and the purpose of the request. Unless the request is related to specified legal actions, a recipient of a request for proprietary information may refuse the request.

The commission must also establish rules related to protecting information provided to the commission.
